 2024-08522024-06-27PMO
ActCanadian Sustainable Jobs Act
SubjectOrder Designating the Minister of Labour and the Minister of Employment and Social Development to be the Specified Ministers for the Purpose of the Canadian Sustainable Jobs Act
PrecisOrder designating the Minister of Labour and the Minister of Employment and Social Development, members of the Kings's Privy Council for Canada, to be the specified Ministers for the purposes of the CANADIAN SUSTAINABLE JOBS ACT.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order designating the Minister of Labour and the Minister of Employment and Social Development, members of the Kings's Privy Council for Canada, to be the specified Ministers for the purposes of the CANADIAN SUSTAINABLE JOBS ACT.
